item.title: 瑞典政府建议削减福利以降低失业率
item.description: 随着北欧国家大选年的临近，瑞典政府提议削减向失业者发放的福利金，以解决欧洲失业率最高的国家之一的问题。【原文：Sweden’s government proposed cutting benefit payments to those out of work to tackle one of Europe’s highest unemployment rates as the Nordic state approaches an election year.】

item.title: 奥地利将房屋租金管制扩展至私人合同
item.description: 奥地利正在将房屋租赁费上涨限制扩大到自由市场，这是奥地利为提高经济承受能力和缓解价格压力而采取的最新措施。【原文：Austria is extending a limit on home-rental-fee increases to the free market in its latest measure aimed at improving affordability and tempering price pressures.】

item.title: 挪威有望因降息而陷入困境：决策指南
item.description: 挪威政策制定者曾表示即将降息，但现在又提出了不执行降息的理由，这让投资者面临千钧一发的局面。【原文：Norwegian policymakers who signaled an upcoming interest-rate cut are now confronting arguments not to follow through with it, setting up investors for a close call.】

item.title: 欧佩克+放松管制，巨型油轮日收入接近 10 万美元
item.description: 石油贸易商正争相抢购超级油轮，以便在中东至亚洲的重要航线上运输原油，由于该地区供应商提高产量，石油贸易商的收益达到两年半以来的最高水平。【原文：Oil traders are rushing to grab supertankers to haul crude on a key route from the Middle East to Asia, bolstering earnings to the highest level in two-and-a-half years as suppliers across the region jack up output.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯：欧洲央行已实现软着陆，但必须保持灵活性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行成功地使通胀率回到了目标值，同时又没有扼杀经济或扰乱金融市场。【原文：The European Central Bank has been successful at bringing inflation back to its target without choking the economy or upsetting financial markets, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 甲骨文股价跌入 "点阵图 "领域引发泡沫讨论
item.description: 如果有人担心人工智能会助长科技股的泡沫，甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp.【原文：For anyone concerned that artificial intelligence is fueling a bubble in technology stocks, Oracle Corp. has entered the conversation.】

item.title: 价格战加剧通货紧缩，中国如何应对 "内战
item.description: 在长期的价格战中，中国电动汽车行业的竞争日趋激烈。近年来，销售电池动力车和插电式混合动力车的品牌数量已从500家减少到129家。根据咨询公司 AlixPartners 的数据，预计到本十年末，其中只有十多个品牌在财务上是可行的。【原文：China’s electric-vehicle sector has become increasingly competitive amid a long-running price war. The number of brands selling battery-powered and plug-in hybrid vehicles has been whittled down from 500 to 129 in recent years. And just over a dozen of those are expected to be financially viable by the end of the decade, according to consultancy AlixPartners.】

item.title: 盖茨支持的基金与航空公司共同推动绿色航空燃料的发展
item.description: 比尔-盖茨（Bill Gates）支持的一家投资基金正与英国航空公司母公司 IAG SA、美国航空集团（American Airlines Group Inc.【原文：A Bill Gates-backed investment fund is teaming with British Airways parent IAG SA, American Airlines Group Inc. and Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. to accelerate the production of sustainable aviation fuel.】

item.title: 押注美联储日平静的股票期权专业人士面临对冲不足的风险
item.description: 华尔街交易员几乎可以肯定，美联储将在今天晚些时候将利率下调四分之一个百分点。他们还相当肯定美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将发出进一步降息的信号，以支持疲软的劳动力市场。【原文：Wall Street traders are all but certain the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates by a quarter percentage point later today. They’re also fairly sure Chair Jerome Powell will signal further reductions aimed at supporting a saggy labor market.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易特使与南非部长据称计划会晤
item.description: 知情人士称，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）和南非贸易部长帕克斯-陶（Parks Tau）预计将于周四举行会谈，以化解关税僵局。【原文：US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer and South African Trade Minister Parks Tau are expected to meet on Thursday in a bid to resolve an impasse over tariffs, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 关于美国与中国的 TikTok 协议，我们知道和不知道的事情
item.description: 经过一年多的谈判，中美两国达成了一项框架协议，将社交媒体平台 TikTok 在美国的业务剥离给一个包括软件巨头甲骨文公司在内的财团。如果协议最终敲定，它将解决北京与华盛顿关系中的一个老大难问题，这个问题已与更广泛的贸易谈判纠缠在一起。【原文：After more than a year of negotiations, the US and China have struck a framework agreement to hive off the US operations of social media platform TikTok to a consortium that includes software giant Oracle Corp. If the deal is finalized, it would resolve a persistent issue in Beijing-Washington relations that has become entangled in broader negotiations over trade.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 1 万亿美元基金在私募股权投资领域收购二手股权
item.description: 阿布扎比投资局正在重新调整其私募股权投资战略，以抓住二级市场的增长机会，尽管整个行业都在努力应对退出低迷和筹资收紧的问题。【原文：The Abu Dhabi Investment Authority is recalibrating its private equity strategy to capture growth in secondaries, even as the broader industry grapples with sluggish exits and tighter fundraising.】

item.title: 高盛称投资者对欧洲股市持怀疑态度
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Global investors are expressing doubt about a European equity rally as they wait for Germany to deliver on its promise of sweeping fiscal reform, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行召开会议，高利率初见成效
item.description: 今年早些时候，巴西央行行长们将借贷成本提高到近二十年来的最高水平，以应对高于目标的通货膨胀，令投资者大跌眼镜。他们今天要传达的信息是，现在改变大胆的利率策略还为时过早，因为进展才刚刚开始显现。【原文：Brazil central bankers bowled over investors earlier this year by lifting borrowing costs to the highest level in nearly two decades to fight above-target inflation. Their message today will be that it’s too early to alter their bold interest rate strategy as progress just starts to show.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称中国命令企业停止购买英伟达人工智能芯片
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》援引知情人士的话报道，中国互联网监管部门已指示包括阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司和字节跳动有限公司在内的公司终止英伟达公司 RTX Pro 6000D 的订单。【原文：China’s internet watchdog has instructed companies including Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and ByteDance Ltd. to terminate orders for Nvidia Corp.’s RTX Pro 6000D, the Financial Times reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 分析师称印尼意外降息将拖累印尼盾
item.description: 据分析师称，印尼央行意外降息可能会继续给印尼盾带来压力，不过美元可能走软可能会限制印尼盾进一步下行。【原文：Bank Indonesia’s surprise interest rate cut may continue to put pressure on the rupiah, though a likely weaker dollar may limit further downside, according to analysts.】

item.title: 恒生银行考虑出售 10 亿美元物业贷款组合
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，恒生银行有限公司正在寻求出售一个价值至少 10 亿美元的房地产抵押贷款组合，因为该行希望解除在城市商业房地产不景气期间积压的坏账。【原文：Hang Seng Bank Ltd. is seeking to sell a property-backed loan portfolio worth at least $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, as it looks to unload bad debt that’s piled up during the city’s commercial real estate slump.】

item.title: 香港寻求通过融资工具和债券扩大人民币的使用范围
item.description: 在中国政府推动人民币全球化的背景下，香港正加大力度促进离岸人民币的使用，并扩大人民币债券的发行。【原文：Hong Kong is ramping up efforts to boost offshore yuan usage and expand bond issuance in the Chinese currency amid Beijing’s push to globalize the yuan.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称欧元区明年工资增长率将低于 2
item.description: 到 2026 年，欧元区谈判工资的增幅将保持在 2% 以下，这坚定了欧洲中央银行对这一通胀压力来源将消散的预期。【原文：Increases in euro-area negotiated wages will hold below 2% into 2026, firming up the European Central Bank’s expectation that this source of inflation pressure will dissipate.】

item.title: 南非通货膨胀率意外降至三个月低点
item.description: 在普遍预期的暂停加息前夕，南非 8 月份的通胀率意外降至三个月来的最低点。【原文：South African inflation unexpectedly eased to a a three-month low in August on the eve of a widely expected interest-rate pause.】

item.title: 卡塔尔财富基金接近达成艾芬豪公司少数股权交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，卡塔尔 5,240 亿美元的主权财富基金即将达成购买加拿大艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. ）少数股权的交易。【原文：Qatar’s $524 billion sovereign wealth fund is nearing a deal to buy a minority stake in Canada’s Ivanhoe Mines Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股市繁荣提升保证金需求，中国经纪商急于出售债务
item.description: 中国的券商正以创纪录的速度发行债务，利用低融资成本的优势，为更多希望通过借贷获得回报的投资者做好准备。【原文：Chinese brokerages are issuing debt at a record pace, taking advantage of low financing costs and preparing for more investors wanting to borrow to juice returns as a result of the nation’s $1.5 trillion stock rally.】

item.title: 穆迪基于信用基本面上调软银债务评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司将软银集团公司的高级无担保评级从 Ba3 上调至 Ba2，将其次级债评级从 B2 上调至 B1。【原文：Moody’s Ratings raised SoftBank Group Corp.’s senior unsecured rating to Ba2 from Ba3 and its subordinated debt rating to B1 from B2.】

item.title: 印尼意外降息促进经济增长；股市上涨
item.description: 印尼银行再次意外降息，并表示正在寻求进一步降息的空间，无视近期印尼盾的疲软，在因失业和低工资引发的暴力抗议活动之后为经济提供支持。【原文：Bank Indonesia delivered another surprise interest rate cut and said it’s seeking space for further reductions, defying recent rupiah weakness to bolster the economy following violent protests over unemployment and low wages.】

item.title: 新加坡计划采取新措施打击诈骗骡子
item.description: 新加坡当局将开始限制与诈骗活动有关联的个人使用关键的数字和电信服务，收紧遏制此类犯罪的措施。【原文：Singapore authorities will begin restricting access to key digital and telecom services for individuals linked to scam activities, tightening measures to curb such crimes.】

item.title: 据说 TA Associates 因关税问题推迟出售 OmniActive
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于美国关税对印度 OmniActive Health Technologies Ltd. 公司业务影响的不确定性，TA Associates 公司正在推迟出售该公司多数股权的计划。【原文：TA Associates is delaying a planned sale of its majority stake in India’s OmniActive Health Technologies Ltd. due to uncertainty about the impact of US tariffs on the business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说德尔蒙蒂集团考虑最多增资 8 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德尔蒙特集团正在考虑筹集多达 8 亿美元的资金，以减少债务。【原文：Del Monte Group is considering raising as much as $800 million in equity to pare debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 苹果新款 iPhone 上市前在华销量下滑
item.description: 在 iPhone 17 发布前的几周，苹果公司在中国的智能手机销量比去年同期下降了 6%，下滑幅度超过了新旗舰产品发布前的典型水平。【原文：Apple Inc.’s smartphone sales in China in the weeks leading up to the iPhone 17 launch fell 6% from the year-earlier period, a deeper slump than is typical ahead of a new flagship product release.】

item.title: SMG 11 亿美元瑞士首次公开募股可能以最高价定价
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的条款，SMG Swiss Marketplace Group 的股东准备从其首次公开募股中筹集约 9.03 亿瑞士法郎（约合 11 亿美元）的资金，因为该交易的价格很可能达到市场定价范围的上限。【原文：SMG Swiss Marketplace Group’s shareholders are poised to raise about 903 million Swiss francs ($1.1 billion) from its initial public offering as the deal is likely to price at the top of the marketed range, according to terms seen by Bloomberg.】
